name: Pavan Iddalagi
description: Mr. Pavan Iddalagi has over 16 years of experience under the computer network domain. He has worked on control and data plane architecture of various network components like routers, switches, and standalone servers.

name: Me Me Khaing

description: I am a PhD scholar at IIIT Bangalore. My research focuses on ML, DL, and distributed computing for renewable energy prediction and efficient task scheduling.
